entry.title: C程序清单9.7
entry.content:
#include<stdio.h>
long fact(int n);
long rfact(int n);

int main(void)
{
    int num;

    printf("This program calculates factorials.\nEnter a value in the range 0-12(q to quit):\n");
    while (scanf_s("%d", &num) == 1)
    {
        if (num < 0)
            printf("No negetive numbers, please.\n");
        else if (num > 12)
            printf("Keep input under 13.\n");
        else
        {
            printf("loop: %d factorial=%ld\n",num,fact(num));
            printf("recursion: %d factorial=%ld\n", num, rfact(num));
        }
        printf("Enter a value in the range 0-12(q to quit):\n");
    }
    printf("Bye!\n");

    return 0;
}

long fact(int n)
{
    long ans;

    for (ans = 1; n > 1; n--)
        ans *= n;

    return ans;
}

long rfact(int n)
{
    long ans;

    if (n > 0)
        ans = n * rfact(n - 1);
    else
        ans = 1;

    return ans;
}
